extendedInfo.description: CNC Force Calculator is a tool that can help any CNC machinist or CNC designer by calculating cutting forces, speeds, feeds and power requirements for end milling operations. Calculates the following:  - Optimal feed and rotation speed  - Material Removal Rate  - Required spindle power and torque  - Cutting tool force  - Chip formation modeling  - Axis motors power and torque requirements  - Vibration frequenciesPaid version includes a material database with a variety of work materials and the ability to choose HSS or Carbide tool. It is also ad-free.More features will be added soon.Free version requires only 2 permissions to access the network for ad updates. Paid version requires no permissions.

reviews.title: Nice and easy to use
reviews.comment: Seems well done. Would be nice have some assurance of correctness, like descriptions (or links to) of the equations used. Havent\' yet had a chance to try the results on a machine.
reviews.author: Elmo M

reviews.title: Free version is USELESS
reviews.comment: Cannot change ANYTHING in free version. Waste of time and space.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Where are the inches
reviews.comment: Only uses mm. Needs inches before I give a 5 star rating
reviews.author: A Google User
